name: Descending The Woods
description: By day, tend to your farm, care for your pets, and explore the mysteries of the haunted woods. By nightfall, They will come from the woods, Beware of ghosts and demons of the haunted woods. Hide, Survive, Build, Fight and Explore in this eerie Survival Horror alone or with friends.

name: Jousting Manager
description: Jousting Manager allows you to play a sports management game from a new angle. Take control of a medieval jousting team and handle all aspects of the club as you compete to reach the top.

name: Dead Get Rekt
description: In the shadow-drenched realm where modern warfare intertwines with necromantic horrors, we have conjured an unparalleled adventure. Forge your arsenal from an evolving deck of cards, face legions of the undead delvers, unearth artifacts of might and vanquish the darkness that festers down the Crypt!

name: Seagulls: Crappy Situation
description: Get ready for an epic odyssey on the high seas! Take aim with your trusty slingshot and fight against the dreaded seagulls, explore the depths and expand your raft. Gather your crew or play solo – the ocean awaits!

name: Cyber Control
description: Cyber Control is a 3D puzzle platformer game set in a dystopian future, where the player controls either Jones Murdock or Jenny Li, rebels who need to escape from the cyber-neural network of the Alphas, a class of superhumans that dominate society.

name: Free Girls!
description: Free Girls! - is a stunning, animated, relaxing game where sexy girls are always free and want to fulfill all your fantasies! In this game you will definitely forget about time and find the girl of your dreams!

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Secret Species Pack
description: Showcase four new bioengineered hybrid dinosaurs in your parks with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Secret Species Pack.

name: DriftCE: Toyota Chaser JZX100
description: The mythic Toyota Chaser JZX100 is available as DLC in DRIFTCE - get into it and burn rubber! Bring your brand-new Toyota to the garage, tune it to increase its performance, and choose your best liveries to make it shine on the track!

name: SCP: Descent
description: Inspired by SCP-087, step into the shoes of an unfortunate student long before the stairwell became legend. Follow the clues left by those who came before, your only choice is to descend.

name: Hidden Castle Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Getaway Driver
description: An open world sandbox style shoot-'em-up. Hijack vehicles and go for a drive or unleash your weapon and cause mayhem across the city. You own this town!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Poland
description: Discover the beauty of Poland in this DLC for the Fernbus Simulator! As one of the largest countries in Central Europe, Poland borders Germany in the west and offers a variety of cultural experiences as well as various landscapes.

name: Guerra Civil
description: You are the Commander of Revolutionaries. Manage your Revolutionaries. Resist the Fascist invasion! Change the history (in a good way)

name: XiuzhenWorld
description: "XiuzhenWorld" is a 3D stand-alone role-playing game. All equipment and items can be purchased from monsters or in stores. All monsters can be captured and turned into their own spirit beasts. The game has no plot and no tasks. You need to constantly upgrade to get better equipment.

name: Liquid Entry
description: A person who can transform into a slime, let's gather water droplets and cleanse the polluted world!

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - High Caliber Weapon Pack
description: Take on the biggest game with the High Caliber Weapon Pack. This package contains three top-grade weapons crafted for pure firepower and maximum range as well as five new cosmetics.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Emerald Coast Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Emerald Coast Australia. The contents of this pack are cosmetic only.

name: Convento
description: A story about growing up online and dealing with IRL updates.A look back at the past 2 decades of gaming that will make you think about the good, the bad, and the ones left behind.

name: The Finals: Season 2
description:
Season 2 was the second season of THE FINALS. It launched on March 14, 2024, and ended on June 13, 2024. The season followed the activities of hacker collective CNS and featured a retro gaming theme.

This season was sponsored by VAIIYA, OSPUZE, and CNS, which added an all-new arena: SYS$HORIZON.

New content introduced in Season 2 includes:
- Arena: SYS$HORIZON
- Game Modes: Power Shift, Terminal Attack
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: 93R, FAMAS, KS-23
- Gadgets: Anti-Gravity Cube, Gateway, Data Reshaper
- Specialization: Dematerializer
- Game show event: Retro Invasion 82
- Progression: Circuits, new career levels
- Private matches

name: TimeSplitters 2 Redux
description:
A fan-made project which aims to fix and enhance the port of TimeSplitters 2 contained in the 2016 game Homefront: The Revolution as a hidden away unlockable easter-egg.

This port of TimeSplitters 2 is rendered natively on PC and console in full HD (to 4K), with widescreen and mouse/keyboard/gamepad support. It also uses high-quality assets and audio.

This project installs into Homefront's game folder and unlocks all of TimeSplitters 2 permanently, fixes several game-breaking bugs, adds quality-of-life enhancements, and extra content.

name: My Pleasure: Season 1
description: My Pleasure is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: Thorgal
description:
Thorgal is an adventure action game with RPG elements, set in the world of popular comics created by Grzegorz Rosiński and Jean Van Hamme. Based on a classic, well-known tale cherished by fans, the fantasy storyline aims to provide a modern and engaging adaptation.

The player will take on the role of the main character of the series, Thorgal Aegirsson - a Viking warrior with a mysterious origin. He will have to face enemies lurking for him and his family - humans and gods known from Norse mythology. Throughout the gameplay, there are many familiar RPG tasks to complete, and he will also have to confront dangerous monsters, bandits, and powerful unknown forces. During his journey, Thorgal will encounter characters previously known from the comics and visit vast, meticulously crafted locations.

Thorgal aims to interest existing fans of the series, attract new fans of fantasy and introduce this classic comic to RPG enthusiasts.

name: +1x2
description: A super simple clicker game with finite goal and few hours of fun. Will you be able to complete it in time to make a refund?

name: Space Manifest
description: Explore the realm of space banking, where strategic competition, intricate dynamics, and absolute profits define the landscape.

name: Border Pioneer
description: You! the most outstanding pioneer who graduated from this kingdom, are finally about to embark on your legendary journey. Construct towns across various levels to fend off waves of attacks from diverse enemies until you establish a firm footing and complete your exploration!

name: No Love Lost: Founders Pack
description: Incoming -- limited-edition content is up for grabs! Start your raiding journey now to seize your chance and acquire the Founder's Pack before it disappears on March 31st! This special content drop includes 10 weapons, an exhilarating new way to travel and a stylish new accessory for your Raider!

name: Vail: Enigmia Pack
description: Join the REYAB Corporation as a mercenary and stand out with the Enigmia Skin pack. Suit up in a sleek new character outfit and build out your arsenal with exclusive weapon skins.

name: EnGaCho: Dreamy Butterfly
description: The path changes depending on player's choices! "EnGaCho" is an arcade-style side-scrolling action game where you advance while defeating enemies and earning money.

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Founder's Pack
description: Experience the perks of being a Founding member of the Iron Orchestra! Secure your Founder's Pack to support the revolution and instantly unlock exclusive items. You'll get instant access to skins, weapon wraps, NOVA, attachments, emotes, executions and holograms, including the new Zoran skin Magma.

name: Shadows of Forbidden Gods: The Horrors Beneath
description: This DLC adds an entire new map layer, under the existing lands, with Dwarves, a new Evil race and a new giant god-thing. Grow your horrific creature across the map, assisted by two new agents and new ways to expand your orcs and Deep Ones.

name: Cyber Story
description: CyberStory, an immersive cyberbullying intervention game, empowers players with effective coping strategies in a digital world. Navigate challenging scenarios, gain insights, and enhance coping skills through engaging challenges. A safe, supportive environment for building resilience.

name: Event Race: Easter Tracks
description: The DLC, "Easter Table" introduces three new egg-citing tracks, and unlocks the two exciting and thrilling game modes; Keep Up and Last One Out.

name: Angel Legion: Charming Mystery - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Five Likes Please
description: Five Likes Please is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Build your arsenal by obtaining new weapons and buying attachments. Obtain "likes" and buy powerful streaks, such as vehicles and power weapons. We know this game is bad, so as long as we can at least get five likes, that would be great.

name: Five Likes Please: Neon Pack
description: A pack that includes new futuristic-themed weapons that operate on heat rather than reloading. This pack also includes more reticules, reticule colors, weapon camos, and the ability to change any base weapon's tracer/muzzle flash color.

name: Five Likes Please: Historic Weapons Pack
description: A pack that includes new weapons, mainly from WW1 and WW2. Each DLC weapon is derived from a base weapon with set attachments and other minor tweaks. The DLC weapons can be equipped even if the base weapon is not unlocked yet, but their attachments cannot be customized.

name: Project Wand: Festival Of Futas
description: Join the Festival of Futas, a survival contest commemorating the first Wandkin warrior, as you compete (and do other stuff) along your fellow questionably-dressed contestants!

name: Educational Enamours
description: Educational Enamours is visual novel for adult only, young student Connor balances a new love, a mysterious teacher, and an old attraction, a childhood friend. Love, intrigue - your choice.

name: Got High
description: GOT HIGH - Engage in battle against the crowd in an exhilarating brawl, speed through labyrinthine traps in races, and compete on the arena in an exciting shooter. Three unique mini-games in one world, full of action and challenges. Are you ready for this multi-level challenge?

name: Cross Impact: Cowboy
description: Download and play Cowboy from Your Only Move Is HUSTLE in Cross Impact!

name: Cross Impact: V1
description: Download and play V1 from ULTRAKILL in Cross Impact!

name: Night Slashers: Remake
description: Night Slashers is a pulse-pounding, horror-themed beat 'em up game, in a nightmarish world filled with bloodthirsty creatures and unspeakable horrors.

name: Psychopath Hunt Two
description: A butcher has captured you and taken you to his house.

name: Marmargee Fighter Girl vs. Zombies & Monsters!
description: Run as Marmargee Fighter Girl or Matmateo Fighter Boy in this simple runner game! Unlock 10 planets by clearing them of zombies and monsters (over 30 types) and evade over 100 types of obstacles and traps! Replay infinitely each planet to increase your level or overall game score!

name: Furry Femboys: Fantasy
description: Furry Femboys meet Fantasy!

name: Tales of Spark: Dragon-Horse Spirit
description: This content requires the base game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165390/Tales_of_Spark/ on Steam in order to play.

name: The Witch's Assistant
description: A sexually explicit visual novel in which the player assists a Witch to run her potion selling business.

name: Inazuma Souls
description: Inazuma Souls is a hackrom of Inazuma Eleven 1 focused on difficulty and being much more challenging than the base games. Besides, it is a hackrom with +1000 players that can be signed, including players from all the sagas and custom players. It also has a postgame with many secrets and a very high difficulty, a unique experience when playing Inazuma Eleven.

name: Rival Commanders
description: Strategic war planning, battle attack/defense tactics, colony base construction, and effective management of resources are all essential for domination in RTS Tactical Warfare. Expand your influence, forge alliances, and outmaneuver rival commanders

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 4
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters. Embark on Tony’s Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single man. Episode 4 brings him to a gay-only Resort in the Caribbean where all guests are free to explore their sexual desires without limitations.

name: Lagoon Lounge 2: The Secret Roommate
description: This is a visual novel featuring beastmen. In a lakeside village, the protagonist picks up a mysterious lion beastman and begins to lead a secret life.

name: Train Simulator Classic: DB Fas 126
description: A new wagon with unique remote shunting feature comes to Train Simulator Classic with the DB Fas 126 from MRW.

name: Garden of Earthly Delights
description: I'm a man with amnesia. However, I see in my dreams a paradise filled with carnal pleasures, pornography, and explicit sex. I need to find this place to recover my lost memory. Melody found me unconscious and naked. She saved my life and I love her. However, I must face my destiny!

name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights
description: This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights. We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world.

name: F1 Manager 2024
description: Lead your team to glory in F1 Manager 2024. A new Formula 1 season has arrived, packed with 24 races, new cars, new Team Principals and an updated F1 Sprint race format. Start your career at one of 10 official F1 teams or create your own for the very first time.

name: Corrupted Paradise
description: Paradise Club is known to the wealthy as the island of all fantasies. The leaders cater to every need: young women, submissives, strippers, twins, etc... Our two heroes arrive on the island to solve the mystery surrounding the disappearance of their half-sister.

name: Gym Camp Simulator
description: A simulation game that challenges players to effectively manage gym camp. Create fitness programs, organize sports events, and provide healthy nutrition options to guide guests toward a healthier lifestyle.

name: I Got Cucked by a Futanari
description: Just because you can't please your wife, doesn't mean she can't be pleased...

name: The Fruit Stealing Girls
description: Princess Verdant and Princess Carmine, sisters, are torn apart when their cherished golden apples vanish. Accusing each other, they send you to spy on the apple tree. Surrounded by the eerie fog that seems to have a life of its own, you must find out who the ghost is.

name: Sensual Slots
description: Enjoy 3 unique slot games. Featuring Women, Men and Anthropomorphic characters. A classic game of slots with an adult twist. Line up three or more symbols from left to right to win cash or even bonus games. Match the featured symbols to view the games characters and more in their natural beauty.

name: Idle Spiral: Arrow Pack
description: You will get the Arrow Spiral as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Snake Pack
description: You will get the Snake-shaped as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Space Pack
description: You will get the Space Spiral as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Daily Spiral Pack
description: Enhance your Daily Bonus and earn extra Spiral Points!

name: Idle Spiral: Bubble Spiral Pack
description: You will get the Bubble Spiral as a new design!

name: Idle Spiral: Water Pack
description: You will get the Water Spiral as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Bonfire Pack
description: You will get the Bonfire Spiral as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Pixel Pack
description: You will get the Pixel Spiral as a new design!

name: RADS: The Radioactive Apocalypse Dating Simulator
description: A post-apocalyptic visual novel with choices and multiple endings. After being accidentally frozen in an Ice Cream Parlour freezer, our college-party-planning hero wakes decades later in a post-apocalyptic world of mutants, robots and monsters... determined to host a party and get a date!

name: Kawaii Puzzle: Girl Adventure
description: Engage in exciting puzzles with charming anime girls, progress through new levels, participate in dialogues, and earn well-deserved rewards! Embark on adventures with adorable anime characters awaits you

name: Epic Dumpster Bear 1.5 DX: Dumpster Fire Rebirth
description: "Epic Dumpster Bear 1.5 DX" is an enhanced version of the indie cult classic platformer that introduces "Epic Dumpster Bear 2" play control into remixed "Epic Dumpster Bear" levels. Inspired by the 16-Bit classics, this retro 2D momentum platformer has 7 worlds, 10 boss fights, and 3D bonus levels

name: Trope Tales
description: A somewhat comical take on classic JRPGs. Take on the role of Hero, a Silent Protagonist, as you venture across the world to defeat the Main Villains with the help of your friends: The Chick, The Smart Guy, and The Childhood Friend.

name: Dye The Bunny 2
description: Dye The Bunny 2 is an Easter-themed psychological and survival horror game and a direct sequel to Dye The Bunny.

name: Astrodelia
description: Astrodelia, an explosion of colors and shapes inspired by Science Fiction of all time. Psychedelic space adventure with an evocative original soundtrack: test your ingenuity and skill, overcome puzzles and mazes, think outside the box to save the Solar System.

name: Vivere Memento
description: A city forgotten by everyone, two women trying to unravel its secrets, and a dismal silence of war. Is it possible to create without the hope of being heard? Is it possible to mourn for someone obliterated in memories?

name: Boo's Burgers
description: Boo's Burgers is a comedic narrative horror game where you work as a nightshift cook and odd jobs in hopes of getting back what you lost.

name: Deep Space Drillers
description: Deep Space Drillers is a top-down spaceship game, where you mine and sell valuable ores from asteroids to upgrade your ship and explore the dangerous depths of space in search of the rarest metals and gems.

name: Hop'n & Bop'n
description: Dive into a rhythmic adventure in this dynamic 3D platformer! Navigate over 30 levels filled with challenges that sync with the music. Run, jump, slide, and slam your way through, uncovering secrets and dodging hazards in a uniquely musical experience.

name: Forest Keeper
description: Survival Horror set on a sinister island. As a lone forest keeper, you'll unravel its grim secrets from the eerie backstory of a royal vacation home turned nightmare. Journey through the changing seasons, from day to night. Confront nightmarish abominations that emerge in the winter cold.

name: Echoes of the Ashen
description: An engaging, casual RPG adventure, featuring bite-sized dungeon crawling with turn-based skirmishes, set in a story-rich, lore-filled world.

name: Silicon Wasteland
description: SILICON WASTELAND is a visual novel set during the twilight years of humanity, and follows the wandering android Silica, as she explores the beautiful and sometimes frightening wonders of the world, in a ongoing quest to discover her purpose.

name: I.O. Setter
description: The main character, astronaut marauder, a former engineer who managed to find out about the secret station, visits the abandoned I.O. complex in search of valuable technologies for further sale. He is absolutely sure that he is the only living being on the station, and in some ways he is right…

name: Jonesville
description: Live, learn, and compete in this classic educational life simulator! Play solo against computer, team up with friends in multiplayer (up to 4 players), or take turns in hot seat mode (up to 4 players+computer).

name: Cabbage Crop
description: Plant and grow fresh crops to wield them as swinging or throwing weapons in this simple tower defense game! Protect your house and magic pet chicken from invading animals, and unlock new types of crops each stage to give your opponents a varying taste of cultivated pain!

name: My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery
description: Take friendship to new heights and tame the chaotic magic that’s turning the world upside down, in a mystery adventure for one or two ponies!

name: China: Mao's Legacy - Ways of Life
description: Push the limits of what you can comfortably expect with this small add-on that gives you unusual possibilities

name: Retrolution Racing
description: Choose one of 36 top-class cars and join the world of retro car racing.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Blood Moon
description: Three Kingdoms: The Blood Moon is a turn-based Roguelike card game where you assume the role of a Shu general. Explore dungeons, gather relics, and amass a collection of cards. In each round, you can assemble a unique combination of cards and treasures to defeat your enemies and rewrite history!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Warden Police Vehicle
description: The Warden Police Vehicle features a light bar on top that can display messages for securing accident sites at night, as well as for setting up road blocks or signaling traffic offenders to pull over.

name: Inside the Machine
description: A simple yet challenging puzzle game where a soul has lost its body. It has to navigate from machine to machine through various puzzles in search of its real body. Will it reach its goal or be forever lost in a foreign body?

name: Dead by Daylight: All Things Wicked Chapter
description: Dead by Daylight's All Things Wicked delves into the depths of analog horror with new Killer, The Unknown, and new Survivor, Sable Ward. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Unknown's Garden Casual and Sable Ward's Designer Corset.

name: Tap Drift Car
description: Here, you will become a drifting expert, challenging various tracks and enjoying the thrilling moments of turning. Very simple operation, but endless driving pleasure. You can also collect various cars and experience the unique handling of each one.

name: Dungeon Exiles
description: Conquer the darkness in Dungeon Exiles, an autobattler roguelike set in a dark fantasy world. Descend into the procedurally generated dungeon, level up, unlock synergies and acquire powerful items as you fight for survival against the tides of darkness!

name: Kanon
description: An expanded port of Kanon that added voice acting to all characters, minus the protagonist.

name: Path to the Creator
description: A Text-Based Strategy RPG that features skills, classes, multiple game modes, crafting and more!

name: Path to the Creator: DLC1
description: Buy this to be able to unlock little minigames to gain more rewards!

name: Koi Garden
description: Koi Garden is 3D Realistic Koi collecting application.

name: Counter Clash
description: Lead religious zealots, spiritual nomads, or scientific warmongers in a fast-paced, tactical strategy game. Discover different troop combos, counters, and environmental hazards to crush the opposition!

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2024
description: Lead your college basketball team in Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2024. Recruit stars, coach for success, and make key decisions with an improved UI, player reveals, enhanced player control, and a revamped transfer portal. The ultimate coaching simulation game!

name: Soulmaze
description: Get confused and have fun! Take control of two characters simultaneously and independently through many mazes making them find each other as fast as possible! Soulmaze is inspired in the belief in soul mates that challenges the ambidexterity and motor coordination of the player!

name: Final Dash
description: Introducing Final Dash, the thrilling platformer where you'll embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through stunning worlds! Jump into fast-paced challenges, create your own levels, and compete with friends. Are you ready to dash to victory?

name: Tenfold Loop
description: Tenfold Loop is a short walking simulator where the player is trapped inside an endless loop. The only way to exit is find 10 consecutives anomalies.

name: Skeleton War
description: Welcome to Skeleton War. It is a light action game that blends Roguelite and Survivor-like features into one. Each map consists of a number of well-designed levels that culminate in a hunt for bosses, exploring each unique gameplay experience in repeated rounds of exhilaration and excitement.

name: Divnozemye
description: "Divnozemye" is a card game like the famous game "Arcomage" (from "Might&Magic"), but in the setting of folk fairy tales and with its own feature - heroes.

name: Banished Stone
description: A casual fantasy action RPG. Wanted for a number of crimes your bounty has reached a level that can no longer be ignored. Work with the Company to earn your freedom and a one way pass to Paradise. Solve your fathers murder, collect bounties, solve quests, tame pets and learn to use your wings.

name: Commander Bug Wars
description: Dive into the thrilling clash between humans and cybernetic bugs. Lead your infantry, tanks, aircraft, and ships through intense battles. Use strategy and tactics to outsmart your foes. Every decision shapes the war's outcome. Are you ready for the challenge? Time to eat the Bugs!

name: It Takes a Village
description: It Takes a Village is a city-building RPG taking inspiration from games like Legend of Zelda and Animal Crossing. Venture into a procedurally generated world filled with monsters, dungeons, and more as you collect resources to build up your village to push back the evil that infests your world.

name: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
description: Device Doctor Simulator 2024 offers an interactive and detailed simulation experience of becoming a technology repair expert. In this unique simulation, dive into the complex world of various digital devices, including smartphones, tablets, and smartwatches.

name: Kanon: Best Edition
description: An enhanced port of Kanon for the PlayStation that adds progressive output, a flicker-free function, and a higher sampling rate.

name: Exosuit
description: Exosuit is a dynamic shooter in a unique style, where the focus is on maximizing the fun of gameplay. The game has no plot and the emphasis is only on unbridled action and unusual visual style.

name: Machinika: Atlas
description: Machinika: Atlas is an indie puzzle game and is the direct sequel to Machinika: Museum, you play as a museum researcher who just land on Atlas. Will you unravel the mysteries of the alien vessel? Solve cryptic puzzles to find out what happened!

name: Way of the Exploding Stick
description: A collaboration between "Jez" and Zhu Zhiqiang, making a fuller beat-em-up based on Zhu's "Xiao Xiao" series of stick figure fight animations and games. It was the 5th and final playable entry in the series.

name: Lupin III
description: The first home console Lupin III game, released for Super Cassette Vision in 1984.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 6
description:
Xiao Xiao No. 6 is the sixth installment in the Flash series Xiao Xiao, but only the third game. Like all previous installments, it once again consists of spectacular fight scenes featuring a black stickman.

The initial part of Xiao Xiao No. 6 is a series of more or less non-interactive fight scenes, where the player must simply keep pressing Space to keep the animation going, with no penalty for delaying. In the next scene, the hero's opponent is locked in a jail cell and the player's goal is to click levers at the bottom to activate crushers in order to kill the prisoner; it's not that easy because the prisoner is smart enough to avoid descending crushers. In the final scene, the player must press Space rapidly to fill a power bar before the time limit, so that the protagonist can deal a single powerful, finishing blow to his opponent; in the case of failure the player can immediately try again.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 4
description: Xiao Xiao No. 4 is the fourth installment in the Flash web series Xiao Xiao, and the second interactive feature. It is a short rail shooter-type game, where the player moves with a gun through the enemy base along a predefined path, quickly shooting all the enemies that pop up before his health is completely depleted. Sometimes the player must also shoot down projectiles launched by the enemies. There are six bullets in the player's magazine and once they run out the gun must be reloaded by pressing Space. There are three difficulty levels available, each granting the player a different number of lives.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 2
description: Xiao Xiao No. 2 is the second installment in the Xiao Xiao Flash web series, and the first one with interactive elements. The player controls a stickman who must get past a wall, avoid cannon fire, and defeat an opponent in one-on-one combat. In each of the three levels the player's role is to press Space when an oscillating "power bar" is at its fullest. If the player presses Space at the wrong time, a cutscene will play in which the hero is killed (there are two possible death scenes, depending on how close the power bar was to its maximum.) However, pressing Space at the right time instead shows a cutscene where the stickman destroys the obstacle and moves on to the next one. The player can also watch all nine cutscenes in a separate video player, accessible from the main menu.

name: Kanon: Standard Edition
description: A port of Kanon: Best Edition that brings the extra CGs from the console versions and Windows 2000/XP support.

name: Lamp Post
description: A mysterious case of an unknown Keter class SCP - Lamp Post.

name: Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng
description: Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng is a licensed Mega Man X series video game released for home computer only in Taiwan by Strawberry Software. Rockman X Shùxué Xuànfēng has six challenges where the player faces a Maverick from Rockman X3. Players can register their names and save high scores, with a leaderboard showing the highest score from each player in each games. In five challenges the player uses X to hit (by shooting or touching) a robot with a number corresponding to the answer of the question. There is a time limit of 60 seconds to each question. The boss attacks him if the answer is wrong, and he faces the boss after making 500 points. The stage is cleared after making 1000 points, and the player can print a certificate.

name: Final Contract
description: A Hired Assassin Goes On His Final Mission...Before Christmas.

name: Rockman Dash Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn
description: Rockman DASH Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn is a licensed Mega Man Legends series video game released for home computer only in Taiwan by Strawberry Software. Rockman DASH Zhěngjiù Dìqiú Dà Màoxiǎn is an educational game with six challenges, one being the main game mode and the other five extra challenges.

name: Destiny Online
description: Destiny Online is a 2D Fantasy MMORPG and offers free-to-play access. Pet System: Capture monsters, make them pets, and have them aid you in combat. Character Dressing up System: Freely DIY your favorite style with hairstyles, headwear, clothes, back accessories, and tails.

name: Brew Besties
description: Brew Besties is a couch co-op top-down game where 2-4 players have to brew potions and deliver them to impatient customers. Every world comes with unique obstacles that will challenge your teamwork.

name: Kanon
description: A port of Kanon on the PlayStation Portable, featuring the CGs in widescreen, adding voice-acting to the main protagonist and a 'Capture' option to save any scene in the game to Memory Stick.

name: Neon Rider Classic
description: Race your bike through cybernetic landscapes, switch your color to navigate between glowing neon tracks and perform crazy flips in Neon Rider Classic. With upgraded graphics, this nostalgic collection Includes Neon Rider and Neon Rider World.

name: Serenestadt
description: It's a cozy city-building game. Create islands and parks. Increase or decrease the size of buildings in your city. Change the colour of trees and bushes.

name: Limb From Limb
description: The Raymond Mitchell Association personally invites you to join our new limb regrowth program. Engage in a game of chance against another patient, risking the loss of your fingers. We have provided items to aid in your success waiting to be uncovered as you traverse the game board.

name: Cubus
description: Descend through a series of endless falling cubes in this fast-paced game. Test your reflexes and timing as you navigate through tight spaces and avoid obstacles.

name: Asterball
description: Enter the galactic gridiron field as a Sportsman to beat your opponents in the fast-paced sport of Asterball. Play in a PVP setting where two teams battle it out in the field to see who can win with the most touchdowns.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Cat Girls? If Made Today
description: Train to become royalty, or royalty-adjacent, while also just trying to get out of this crazy, weird academy alive. Will you date any cat girls or cat boys along the way? Highly probable.

name: Sneaky Snacks
description: Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... The snacks are missing! Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 20 different snacks across 20 medieval style levels while not running out of time!

name: Answer To Survive
description: Can you win in the best show in the afterlife?

name: Fear Odyssey
description: When fear is incarnated in our humanity, many things happen, good and bad, take control of this fear by mixing 2D and 3D dimensions and live a journey beyond Greece.

name: Illusion Carnival
description: A lost soul wanders through a pop-up book-like whimsical and eerie amusement park; experience fun levels, meet unique characters, escape spirit erosion, and uncover the secrets of the park… The charming yet dark Illusion Carnival begins.

name: Kitchen Delights
description: Kitchen Delights is an exciting cooking game that will put your culinary skills to the test, where you can be a chef in a restaurant or a burger joint, creating delicious dishes. With a touch of chaos and lots of fun.

name: Revenge of the Antagonist
description: Gerald isn't a known actor, so he struggles to land roles. But the guy who (unintentionally) made a mockery of him became a popular heartthrob. Who wouldn't feel resentful? Years later, the two reunite as the antagonist and protagonist for a romance drama.

name: Cuckold House
description: In this story, you will find yourself in the center of the life of Jacob, who is unable to sufficiently satisfy his wife, who is trying in every way to help her husband become more confident in himself and in bed.

name: Lily in DreamWorld
description: An action RPG where the departed miniature dachshund Lily strives to reunite with her owner!!

name: A Silent Desolation
description: Stranded on Earth centuries after humanity's departure, A Silent Desolation, created by a single developer, immerses you in the mystery of an abandoned world. Craft, explore, and unravel the secrets of a forgotten Earth as you embark on a quest to repair a space shuttle launch base.

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Premium Bundle
description:
The Premium Bundle includes the following content:
- The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion
- The Shadow of the Erdtree Digital Artbook
- Original Soundtrack

name: No Signal
description: A narrative-driven hidden object game about finding parts, fixing computers, and listening to recorded conversations. Learn the meaning behind the mysterious signals emitted by the black hole. Find your way back home.

name: Gladiatory
description: Gladiatory - a Roguelite Hack & Slash RPG Game

name: Dungeon Clawler
description: Dungeon Clawler is a Roguelike Claw Machine Deckbuilder. Build your unique deck, fight enemies by grabbing weapons and items from a claw machine and find special artifacts that help you on your quest to reclaim something you lost... Aim carefully to claw your way through this dungeon!

name: Dungeons & Cardboard
description: Dungeons & Cardboards is a Tactical RPG / Dungeons Crawler inspired by Role Playing games. Follow the POV of a group of 4 players, against the supreme Cardboard Master, and crush his big bad Boss, by stuffing yourself in his dungeons, populated by dubious enemies, and handmade decorations.

name: Jet Skiing Race
description: Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate aquatic thrill ride with Jet Skiing Race!

name: Doll Impostor
description: "Doll Impostor" is a horror game where you're the guardian of possessed dolls. Identify the impostor before 9 a.m. or face dire consequences. Every hour counts in this race against fear.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Spooky Cat Girls 2?!
description: Straight from the fright factory comes three SPOOKY games in one! Date demons from the center of the planet! Save a spooky theme park! Smash some faces in as giant Kaiju!

name: Legends of Starkadia
description: Legends of Starkadia is a quirky turn-based RPG full of action-packed adventure! The Starkadian Empire is under attack by one of their own and it’s up to a team of unlikely heroes to assist the resistance to restore peace by defeating Niko and his legion of interstellar armies.

name: The Well of Essenwood
description: Embark on an enchanting journey in a medieval fairytale land. Play as two main characters, Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep. Each begins their own adventure, and eventually unite to unravel a sinister plot to seize the magical well in the Essenwoods, which contains the very essence of magic in the land.

name: Exit Kun: Play Together
description: Experience the fun of Kunkun with your friends! You can play online through local or Steam remote play.

name: Train Sim World 4: Fife Circle Line - Edinburgh: Markinch via Dunfermline & Kirkcaldy Route
description: From the Scottish Capital to the Firth of Forth Lowlands, embark on passenger services over iconic cantilevers and along picturesque coastline. A modern ScotRail Turbo stars in the spotlight of Rivet Games’ Fife Circle Line in Train Sim World 4!

name: Kanon
description: A mobile port of Kanon.

name: Going Upstream
description: Paddle your canoe up the river as far as you can go! It's a simple game of just climbing up the river.

name: E-Girl RoomMate
description: "E-girl RoomMate is an addictive hentai clicker game. Help the protagonist record videos for his daring roommate's OnlyFans profile. Purchase suggestive scenes and increase your success with power-ups in the shape of adorable kittens. Scale the heights of seduction in this clicker game for adults.

name: Dark Sanctum
description: Overcome challenges, plan strategies, and collect cards and resources to progress in a procedural world of turn-based auto-combat. Embark on a strategic journey with an initial deck, face diverse enemies, unlock new decks, and strategically build your arsenal.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles
description: The anime girls are waiting to solve puzzles with you! Enjoy a plentiful selection of anime jigsaw puzzles, with a wide variety of gameplay modes.

name: Nobody Wants to Die
description: Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York, 2329; immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. In this interactive noir story, lead the investigation using advanced technology, as Detective James Karra who risks it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite.

name: Towers & Goblins: The Last Stand
description: Build massive towers, manage your resources, create a team of powerful warriors, and try to stand as long as you can. Every choice you make will decide the destiny of your kingdom!

name: Kiwie vs. Desert
description: Kiwie vs Desert is a cute and cozy front facing runner starring Kiwie the cat. Navigate through 50 levels of increasing difficulty as you fly over cacti and dodge enemies on your quest to get Kiwie home.

name: Blood Bar Tycoon
description: Blood Bar Tycoon is a vampire bar management game. Build bars and blood factories, lure humans to harvest their blood, process it, and serve your customers: other vampires. Research quirky machines and deal with hunters! Expand through Crimson City to become a mighty Elder!

name: Escape Island
description: "Escape Island: An exciting survival adventure! Your mission: Escape from a deserted island full of dangers. Explore, hunt and collect resources to survive. But beware of lurking threats! Use your intelligence and skills to overcome obstacles and escape!"

name: Backrooms: Rebirth
description: The protagonist doesn't die due to a plane crash, but the protagonist is crashed into the Backrooms, where you'll explore to find the exit, and your mind will be reminiscent of the fantasies you had before the crash.

name: WizUp!
description: Incremental game with unfolding mechanics, resource management, and WIZARDS!

name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - Astro Bot Costume
description: Icon vs icon. Game recognises game. Hero meets… you get the idea. The platinum princes of PlayStation platforming royalty finally meet as Sackboy unveils his new out-of-this-world ASTRO BOT costume. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

name: A Zombie Tail
description: Defeat waves of zombies in this strategy defense style game. Armed with a bone and several power ups, keep the zombies at bay as you battle across several levels, by timing and managing your attacks across 4 lanes. Will Roxy find her human before the zombies do!

name: Dreamscape Return
description: Let's play games together.

name: Parking Driver
description: Parking simulator, come and challenge it now

name: High Seas, High Profits!
description: Live your medieval trader life by buying low, selling high and exploring the world in a chill, turn based setting. Buy ships, build businesses, find or train captains, deal with pirates, ambitious mayors and traders & react to hundreds of events that shape your very own procedurally generated world!

name: Burglar Inc
description: A co-op theft and simulation game. Plan intricate heists with your team, infiltrate high-security locations, outsmart laser obstacles, and more. The thrill of the heist awaits!

name: X Mutation
description: Survive against thousands of monsters with the ability to mutate your body into various weapons! X-Mutation is a classical 3d top-down rogue-lite action game. Choose from hundreds of exciting mutations and upgrade them in different ways to create your unique build!

name: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
description: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a card-based deep survival simulator and the next installment in the Card Survival Series. Carve yourself a home in a primordial forest that has a will of its own. A day-to-day life simulator in a world where nature reigns with mystery, beauty and sometimes cruelty.

name: Battler
description: Jump as a samurai ghost into a beautiful hell filled with damned soul. Alone, with or against your friends, fight for your survival with fine-tuned and fast paced top down combat mechanics. Gain enough power and momentum killing foes to fight the ultimate keeper, but don't get hit!

name: Hack.ing
description: It's the easiest game in the world. If you like green and hate red, know how to unlock doors with keys, and can connect circles with lines, you can beat the game very easily.

name: Shoot The Barrel
description: Shoot the Barrel game. In this top down shooter you are the protagonist fighting against the barrels. 1. Shoot the incoming barrels in this runner shooter game 2. See how far you canget 3. As you survive the barrels become harder to destroy 4. Gather teammates and fight the barrels together

name: CriticalOrb
description: Defeat continuously incoming monsters with various abilities!CriticalOrb is a 3D top-down shooting game. Choose various abilities to defeat the continuously incoming monsters until the boss appears! You need to become more critical before the boss arrives!

name: Bal
description: A VR dating simulator with your own adventure playstyle. Gain stats and work to gain coins. You have 30 days to complete as many women as possible.

name: Bery'sCase
description: This is a first person horror game where players will take on the role of a detective who discovers the truth behind a family murder case, embarking on a brave adventure

name: Foto Boy: A New Job
description: Capture the Moment! Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin dream job.

name: Soul Wizards & Rogulite
description: Adventurers led by a mysterious girl take on the challenge of a labyrinth that reshapes itself with every entry, aiming for the deepest layer. This title is a new kind of RPG that introduces soul-like and rogue-lite elements into a Wizardry-like 3D dungeon RPG.

name: Arc TCG
description: ARC TCG is a 3D fantasy card game. Build your deck and challenge other players in battles full of surprises. Play smart and crush your opponents with powerful abilities. This game is inspired by more successful TCG titles, but adapted to offer new game strategies.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Soft Cuddly Girl GP-02
description: The following content for "Soft Cuddly Girl" will be supported on "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 it's a Night Magic + GP02". 1. Marriage system 2. Private maid mode 3. Empire life mode

name: Stop! Don’t Die In Australia
description: "STOP! Don’t Die in Australia" Australia is a playground for laughter and cheeky surprises. This game isn’t just a love letter to the land of kangaroos and koalas; it’s a full-on comedy show that has you trekking and chuckling through the quirkiest spots down under.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Soft Cuddly Girl GP-01
description: The following content for "Soft Cuddly Girl" will be supported on "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 it's a Night Magic + GP01". 1.Empire Life Mode

name: Solse AI-Quest
description: Solse AI-Quest: an AI-powered RPG where conversations shape the adventure. Navigate a pixel-art world, engage with dynamic characters, and influence the story through choice-driven actions and time skips. A retro-style game re-imagined.

name: Nevermind
description: Nevermind - is a visual novel, which takes place in a post-apocalyptic world in Russia. You will have to fight for survival, collecting resources and exploring destroyed cities, but the most important thing is to learn what it means to be human.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Soft Cuddly Girl GP-01fb
description: The following content for "Soft Cuddly Girl" will be supported on "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 it's a Night Magic + GP01b". ・Sexy love date play ・Happy happy morning!

name: Knowledge, or Know Lady
description: You, the "sole male student" at a women's university, are about to embark on a sweet and laughter-filled campus love journey from a first-person perspective! How will you resist the temptations of the beauties and create your own legend in this girls' school?

name: Deflect Boy
description: Deflect Boy is a top-down arena shooter, that instead of guns, you only have a shield. Deflect the bullets, acquire, and combine new skills to create unique deflection powers and survive until the nightmare ends.

name: Typing Ninja
description: Typing Ninja is an upcoming fast-paced typing game where players type falling words before they hit the ground, featuring Arcade and Story options. Players can use power-ups, face challenging bosses, and customize keycaps.

name: Give Me Clair Back
description: First/third horror story about Nethan Black, wrongly blamed for the disappearance of his girlfriend Clair, must gather the evidence necessary to prove his innocence while facing out-of-this-world challenges.

name: No Ticket Back: Craft, Survive & Escape
description: As the brave crew sets course for the Red Planet, their mission takes a terrifying turn. In the vast emptiness of space, their once-proud vessel becomes a haunted nightmare. Can they survive the horrors that await them in the darkness and escape or will they succumb before completing their mission?

name: Eve of Destruction
description: Play as Eve, a creature unaware of their own legend, awakened from your eternal slumber and sent to the Spirit Realm: a world in ruins, dominated by Demons and Knights - will you bring salvation or destruction?

name: Aerial_Knight's We Never Yield
description: Discover pulse-pounding stylized parkour action as you run, jump, smash, and slide through an afro-futurist-inspired kingdom. Enjoy a single-player or two-player local cooperative mode and experience the story of two brothers and their unexpected return to their lost kingdom.

name: Mannequin House
description: Mannequin House is a horror game where you collect paintings while running away from the Mannequins that come your way. Recommended for: people who want to be scared People who want to be surprised People who are tired of playing errand games A broadcaster with a reputation for good reactions

name: Tavern Girl
description: As night falls, the city's neon lights begin to flash, and the rhythm of bar music echoes on the streets. Can you find the TA in your heart? In this city where night falls, your romantic adventure is about to begin!

name: Ultimate Armored Turbodrifter: Saga Chapter 2 - Tank Authority Wolfram
description: Take control of a powerful drone tank meant for drifting and destroying cars! Destroy cars, earn your wage. WARNING: [Drinking hydraulic fluid will make you poop smoother]

name: DeadballCrusader
description: Defeat the Evil Demons with your baseball bat

name: Emberdrift
description: A flow platforming rogue-like with extremely fast paced combat and traversal, punctuated by insane movement abilities, epic bosses, and over-the-top upgrades.

name: Potion Shop Simulator
description: Master the art of alchemy in Potion Shop Simulator, a unique blend of simulation and strategy. Brew potions, manage your shop, and cater to a magical clientele in a single-player or co-op experience of the medieval fantasy world.

name: Quest Eternal
description: Speed you way through different levels and environments in this old-school platformer. Unlock new abilities and try to complete the levels as fast as possible. Go back to previous levels and try to beat your old score using your newfound power. Fight and defeat evil on your eternal quest.

name: 30 Days of Tower
description: By managing your tower during the day you prepare yourself for the dangers of the night, the king depends on you to dominate this territory. Will you be able to survive 30 days in this distant land?

name: Rockman The Puzzle Battle
description: Rockman The Puzzle Battle (ロックマン ザ パズルバトル, Rokkuman za Pazuru Batoru) is a game released by Capcom on July 1, 2011 for docomo, au and SoftBank branded mobile phones in Japan. The game is currently available for download via Capcom's digital download service, and the i-mode Internet service for docomo brand phones.[1]

name: Vysions
description: Welcome to Vysions, a world made of dreams, where puzzles are truth and you must bring meaning to their madness.

name: Collateral Dungeon
description: Collateral Dungeon is a tactical puzzle dungeon crawler. Explore as an archaeologist trapped in your most recent dig: an enemy-infested dungeon. However, you are a lover, not a fighter. Without weapons, you must turn to your wit and clever traps to defeat enemies lest you relive your failings.

name: Drive Beyond Horizons
description: Rev up your engines and venture into the unknown with Drive Beyond Horizons! Conquer dynamic landscapes, customize your ride, and unearth hidden treasures. Get ready for heart-pounding challenges and endless excitement. Your adventure starts now !

name: Potato Salad
description: Play as 1 of 7 potatoes spanning generations and genres in your quest to defeat the King of Spudtown once and for all.

name: Zarya
description: Zarya - a narrative simulator of a rural driver in a post-Soviet style. Deliver packages along country roads, assist the villagers, earn money, collect classic cars, and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the homeland.

name: Recoil Cluck
description: Recoil Cluck is a dungeon adventure game featuring a little yellow chick as the protagonist.

name: Bonk'em
description: A simple "Whack-a-Mole" game for the Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Rockman no Dot Art Logic
description: Rockman no Dot Art Logic is a Rockman themed picture logic puzzle game. Each puzzle completed could be downloaded as an emoji to Deco Mail.

name: Lemonade Apocalypse
description: Lead the world to apocalyse with lemonades! Price affects demand, but take into account the cost of each lemonade when selling. Upgrades reduce cost and increase demand. Invest in a factory, and eventually control the politics of the world to increase climate's temperature and beverage consumption.

name: Sugar Tanks 2
description: This is an intense, fast-paced, and super-sweet tank shooter game. Defend your sweet home world from evil grey tanks, trying to sap all the color from it.

name: Kanon: Memorial Edition
description: A port of Kanon with support for Windows Vista/7.

name: Kanon
description: Android port of Kanon.

name: Kanon
description: iOS port of Kanon.

name: Kokoro Quest
description: RPG about adventuring in a different world for a stupid reason.

name: Kanon
description: The remastered version of Kanon, which features the CGs in high definition and color corrected and includes full voice-acting utilizing both recordings made in the Dreamcast/PS2 and PSP releases of the game (minus Shiori, whose non-PSP lines were newly recorded) and touchscreen support.

name: The Elder Scrolls Bundle
description: A complete collection of all single-player The Elder Scrolls games released on PC.

name: Pro-Logic Mah-Jong Hai-Shin
description: Pro Logic Mahjong Hai-Shin is the first game in the Hai Shin series and is a mahjong game with different game modes.

name: Rockman Dash Golf
description: Rockman Dash Golf is a spin-off sports game in the Mega Man Legends series that was released to Japanese mobile phones, available via the i-mode internet subscription service. In the game, players have the ability to play as Rock (Rockman in-game, high power and low technique), Tron (Toron in-game, balanced), or a Kobun (low power and high technique) on a variety of golf courses.

name: Rotrex
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman Bug Sweeper
description: Rockman Bug Sweeper (ロックマン バグスイーパー Rokkuman Bagu Suīpā) is a Mega Man themed Minesweeper game released by Capcom for mobile phones in Japan. Instead of mines, Mega Man and Beat deal with hidden bugs.

name: Better Cluck Next Time II
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man Rush Marine
description: Take the plunge with Mega Man and his shape-shifting robot dog, Rush in this original side scrolling shooter set in the deep blue sea. In the year 20XX Dr. Wily sends his robot minions to the seabed in order to drill for oil causing earthquakes and destruction to the surrounding islands. Only Mega Man and the newly submersible Rush Marine have any hope of stopping Wily’s nefarious plan.

name: Better Cluck Next Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man Space Rescue
description:
Mega Man Space Rescue, known as Rockman Space Rescue in Japan, is a game released by Capcom for mobile phones. Equipped with a jetpack and astronaut suit, Mega Man travels in space to rescue astronauts.

The game had a Christmas themed version titled Mega Man Rocket Christmas, where a Santa Mega Man delivers gifts to children.

name: Warp Defender
description: A fast-paced action shooter where you defend the warp routes from cosmic abominations.

name: The Bomb Disarmament Expert
description: You're the one and only Bomb Disarmament Expert and you've been tasked with disarming a ticking bomb that's right in front of you, so don't panic. You might just blow up if you do!

name: Cortex Chronicles 6: The Infiltration of Nyx Sterling
description: Sin descripción

name: Cortex Chronicles 1: The Trial of Rowan Reed
description: Sin descripción

name: Cortex Chronicles 2: The Ride of Jax Riven
description: A whole underworld exists in the old tunnels below Cortex City. Bikers called the D-Boys risk their lives to deliver packages and keep the life of the undercity pumping. You are Jax Riven, a D-Boy that gets tangled in a delivery gone wrong.

name: Cortex Chronicles 3: The Escape of Rowan Reed
description: Rowan Reed is imprisoned in one of the worst prisons in existence. But not all is lost. Help is outside. Rowan just needs to get there.

name: Cosmo Nash: Culinary Courier
description: Sin descripción

name: Play'te Spinna
description: A small score chaser using the crank to keep the increasing number of plates spinning for as long as possible.

name: Hai-Shin 2
description: The sequel to Pro-Logic Mah-jong Hai-Shin.

name: Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears
description: Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears is a turn-based RPG where you use combinations of various heroes to clear dungeons. Train and utilize heroes to fight off those corrupted by the Black Tears and overcome difficult trials.

name: Sheep Gather
description: Wander through flower fields, beaches, mountains, and more to find hidden sheep.

name: Orbeats
description: Orbeats is a crank-based rhythm game made for the PlayDate with a light space theme.

name: Legend of Penguin
description: Follow the journey of a penguin awakening in a mysterious dungeon, grappling with questions of who he is and how he arrived there.

name: Planet-Fall
description: Descend from the mothership on a frantic dash to the planet's surface. Dodge asteroids in an arcade style high-score experience for the Playdate.

name: Crabland
description: A puzzle game where you rotate puzzle pieces with a crank to match 3. The goal is to prevent crabs from reaching the ocean.

name: Sail or Fail
description: Sin descripción

name: Number 7
description: Number 7 reimagines the classic Lines game, infusing it with modern features.

name: Kitty Pig
description: Take control of Pig and move to bounce Kitty high in the sky to collect bugs. Keep Kitty in the air as long as you can to chase hi-scores, but be warned, with each new level Kitty bounces faster and faster as tricky beetles join the fray!

name: Snekris
description: A unique blend of classic snake gameplay and innovative gameplay mechanics. Achieve the highest score by smartly navigating Snekkie, your ever-hungry serpent, through a dynamic world with many special items and dangerous obstacles.

name: Playing with Our Lives
description: You operate a lignite excavator in a surface coal mine. There is a huge amount of money to be made and everything that gets between you and those potential profits has to be destroyed.

name: Shift II
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Chuck
description: Sin descripción

name: Sequential
description: Sin descripción

name: Funny Racer
description: In Funny Racer, you can groove to simple controls that anyone can master, but perfecting your lines is a never-ending pursuit. As well, challenge your ghost on a retro-inspired track, and strive to unlock all 8 cars in your new Playdate obsession!

name: Dirty Harry: Excessive Force
description: An unreleased video game based off the Dirty Harry film franchise by Warner Bros..

name: Tomb of the Brain
description: Sin descripción

name: Starhack
description: Welcome to STARHACK, a fast-paced action puzzler in space! Hack the enemy's systems by rotating a 2x2 section of tiles. Connect a line of same-colored squares from one side of the board to the other to clear the line and score! Be careful though; while the line can turn, it cannot branch or loop.

name: Hillslide
description: A snowboarding game where you ride down a procedurally generated slope, racing to outpace an ever-encroaching avalanche. Perform tricks and combos to earn points, and complete tasks to unlock upgrades that increases your odds of survival.

name: Hunters of Ralk
description: An unreleased role playing game designed by the co-creator of "dungeons & dragons", which was meant to be the start of a series featuring 3D combat in a first person perspective and textured mapped graphics.

name: Wes Craven's Principles of Fear
description: An unreleased game by Cyberdreams which was meant to release for Halloween in 1997 for the PC, and was based off a concept by horror movie director Wes Craven.

name: Psycho Dreams
description: Psycho Dreams is a surreal psychological horror game inspired by Yume Nikki, with deep atmosphere, interesting mysteries and exciting story inspired by the best visual novel games!

name: Crab Boat
description: Sin descripción

name: Night Raid
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Flies Like an Arrow
description: You play as a newly recruited Time Fly, an elite squad of time cops. You are chasing down suspects for violating time crimes. Collect time arrows to extend the stability of the time stream and reach the suspect. But there is a catch. In order to capture them, you need to once again travel in time and replay the stream with a second copy of yourself.

name: Simple Mind
description: A version of the classic "Mastermind" logic puzzle for the Playdate console.

name: SCP-D38813
description: A creepy-pasta narrative game for the Playdate console in which you play an SCP Foundation researcher attempting to unravel the mystery of an anomalous Playdate. The device has enciphered classic articles from the SCP wiki, and you'll have to crank to crack the cryptograms and solve the mystery.

name: Hermit
description: Hermit is a card game that reimagines the classic "Solitaire" with new mechanics designed to enhance player choice and strategic depth.

name: Rota
description: Use your Playdate's crank to swing from anchor to anchor as you try to beat your high-score while avoiding the inevitable.

name: Under the Tree
description: Battle over two dozen unique monsters as you penetrate deeper and deeper into Ugnet's Dungeon, leveling up, learning new Spells, and becoming more powerful in the process.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 1 Doom
description: FNAF Doom is a mod of the famous game Doom that combines elements from Five Nights at Freddy's (FNAF) with the intense and frenetic gameplay of Doom. In this mod, you can play with your friends or other players online while trying to survive the attacks of the scary animatronics.

name: Youkai Kori Kassen
description: Youkai Kori Kassen, also called "Catastrophe War of Fox and Raccoon Dog" by fans, is a Touhou fan game written in Danmakufu by raichu, released in full on 27 March 2013. At first, it resembles a typical Touhou game, but plays more like Fairy Wars.

name: Trickle Greenweed
description: Help Trickle Greenweed, newly qualified mermaid attorney, save Christmas! Seanta has been accused of murdering CHRISTMAS ITSELF, and only Trickle, and her new friend Sparky the mer-elf, can prove Seanta's innocence and save the most magical time of the year!

name: X-Men: Character - Cyclops
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Iceman
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Jean Grey/Phoenix
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Magneto
description: Sin descripción

name: Punchgolf
description: Play as a golf ball that can jump and be punched to get past obstacles to your goal! with a cast of weird golf balls.

name: P.O.O Weekly
description: A game about South African Political Satire and Parody based on real historical events.

name: Horn-Nie
description: This is a game about animal poaching and how the endangered species gain super powers which they use to fight poachers and save their captured animal friends.

name: Polygunr
description: Sin descripción

name: Untitled Zombie Game
description: Joburg city’s population has turned into zombies. To save his mother a taxi driver has teamed up with an unlikely group to save u’mama.

name: Bot Patrol
description:
Bot Patrol is a puzzle adventure about a small worker bot on its path to freedom.
Beyond traditional sokoban mechanics, Bot Patrol features abundance of extended elements, that make achieving the goal a lot trickier. Conveyor belts, cranes, energy barriers and button triggers and not at last the evil guard drones are added into the mix.
Bot Patrol is visually polished, hard but fun puzzle challenge, but not a rage inducting repetition machine - it comes with a gracious infinite Undo and Level Reset mechanics, to always be able to take that one step back, that went to far.

name: Facility 079
description: Explore the winding corridors of research Facility 079 in this first-person Horror Adventure game as you guide logistics employee Aiden Pryce through the abandoned bunker's hazardous depths on a search for critical data that holds the key to avert the impending apocalypse.

name: 3D3D
description: A maze game made by Jeff Minter from Llamasoft. The maze was a cube, and you could go through holes in the floor and ceiling as well as left and right

name: Hellgate
description: Insanely intense shooter in which the player controls 4 guns firing into a central arena.

name: Super Grid Runner
description:
Yet again earth is under attack by the slimelords of Xtharrgg. The positive is that a few of the very latest Vorton Hyper X-13 UltraStarfighters are at hand, the negative, the only pilot good enough to fly them is you!

name: Panther
description:
Panther, a battle tank-driving simulation named after the Panther tank, was one of a handful of early first-person computer games developed by John Edo Haefeli and Nelson Bridwell in 1975 at Northwestern University. The game was developed for the multi-user interactive computer-based education PLATO system and programmed in the TUTOR programming language and utilized scalable vector graphics called linesets. A 1977 development of Panther, with more refined graphics, was named Panzer.

The game features team-based deathmatch. There are two teams, Squares and Triangles. The object of the game is to destroy the opposing team's base. Game play is straightforward; the player selects a pseudonym and a team, traverse the terrain looking for enemies to destroy on the way to their base. Perspective is maintained by the use of scalable vector graphics and visual interest is enhanced with special graphics for explosions using a custom character set to accomplish limited raster graphics animation.

When players enter the game their tanks are placed randomly in the playing arena near their bases and are temporarily camouflaged to allow time to orient themselves with the current map and state of play. The initial view of the game is in "on-board" mode, which is a first-person perspective of the arena. The other main view available is the map which shows the 5 mountains (Crag, Nixon, Og, Pathos, and Red) which vary in size and placement each time a new game is started. On the map view players can see all of their team members positions and can see enemies only when they are within range. Messaging between team members is available and broadcast-style messages (insults) to the opposing team are also allowed. Team coordination and cooperation is critical to winning in this game as each player has different skills, some players are better at hunting down and killing enemies (or at least engaging and distracting them), others are good at hiding and sneaking to the opposing base to begin bombardment. An interesting capability of the game is that players can donate ammunition and fuel to other players in order to facilitate their role in the game. Ammunition and fuel are loaded at the player's base.
