name: Wishful Journey: Love Across Time
description: Xu yuan, who was a loser in real life traveled to an ancient palace. By transforming into the male protagonist, players will be in love with many beauties with different personalities, such as the unruly princess, the cold female assassin, embark on a love adventure that spans time and space.

name: Croak Croak On The Sea
description: A frog trapped alone on an uninhabited island in the middle of the sea. One day, a suspicious head comes flying there. And a dear friend of the missing frog. A frog holding a rusty axe in his hand for the first time in a long time. Can the frog find a friend?

name: Please Leave Me Alone, I Need to Poop
description: Part visual novel, part WarioWare-inspired minigame collection, Please Leave Me Alone, I Need to Poop is a modern workplace comedy that you can beat within a short session in your office bathroom stall. Multiple stories, multiple minigames, and multiple endings provide replayability.

name: Lost Group
description: Lost Group is a 1-5 player Co-op Horror game, Explore abandoned locations with your friends and try to complete tasks to earn your freedom

name: Blood Crossroad
description: Blood Crossroad is a first-person psychological tale about William, a man who must deal with his alcoholism and his deepest shame as he is chased by a mysterious presence from Japanese folklore.

name: Deperson
description: Are you ready to step into a dark and mysterious world with Aaron, who is afraid of his own shadow? A file that has been closed for years is opened again, the forgotten ones wake up from their sleep and the silence is broken by screams.

name: Crossed Wires
description: Navigate your oblivious companion through a world filled with dangers such as lasers, rush hour traffic, homemade flamethrowers and aggressive cleaning robots by solving a variety of puzzles in this hilarious and unpredictable adventure. Can you keep him safe from himself?

name: Realmweaver
description: Realmweaver is an Isometric grid-based puzzle game that tests both your puzzle solving and timing skills with a unique set of puzzles and mechanics to master and overcome!

name: Swamp Up
description: Jump between mushrooms, collect power-ups and break records while exploring your own path through a procedurally loaded map in this innovative endless runner with no lane limitations. Be fast, precise, and skillful to avoid all of its dangers. And most importantly, never touch the water.

name: Bar Breaker
description: Brace yourself, hero, for a battle unlike any other against a tyrannical health bar, a relentless titan fueled by its every defeat.

name: StarsAway
description: Classic rail shooter action. Find secrets and tactics to clear levels effectively across three difficulty settings. Unlock mini games as you progress.

name: Find 101 Doomers
description: Find 101 Doomers is the first object search game in which you have to find all the yearning doomers!

name: StimuAction
description: ・Blue troops are allies, red troops are enemies. ・In the hexagonal map, friendly units are thrown against enemy units, and combat ensues. ・The battle is a side view action, shoot, shoot, slash. ・You can win by destroying all the enemy units! ・Use turrets and laser turrets to attack unilaterally!

name: Shinseikatsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Putrika 1st.Cut: The Reason She Must Perish
description: "Even though I knew this love was forbidden..." While the tragedy is being told, the girl's true love is revealed! Enjoy this crazy pure love drama with beautiful visuals and cute characters!

name: 100 Funny Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the funny locations with Cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of funny location and cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: 11F
description: "I'll be waiting on the 11th floor." Until the moment you arrive

name: Zombie Apocalypse Survivor
description: This is a survivor zombie game, you encounter a lot of zombies in an abandoned village, they are very dangerous, you must survive here. So you must strengthen yourself, upgrade your weapons, enhance your various attributes, and fight the zombies face to face!

name: Wonderland: The Visualized Girl
description: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: Stop Rod
description: After being smashed by a pole in the parking lot, we made this game! The personal lesson reminds everyone, be careful of being hit by the stop rod in the parking lot~

name: Legend of the Sword
description: Legend of the Sword is a casual survival game. In the game, players first need to ensure their survival. The operation of the game is very simple. Clicking the left mouse button is the operation of the sword. Clicking the right mouse button is, homecoming, the operation

name: Stellar Legacy
description: Create your own furry character! In "Stellar Legacy" you'll meets friends, fight alongside them, and share joyful moments! With a exciting PVE challenges, thrilling PVP battles, and various unique life skills, a boundlessly free and fantastical world awaits you.

name: Drifting Bottle Cap
description: One day, you returned home feeling exhausted. Everything that has happened during these days has put a lot of pressure on you. Suddenly, you see a few bottle caps in the water. You don't know if this hands-free drifting game can be enjoyed by yourself... even if it's just a short moment of time?

name: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven - Side Stories 2
description: Stories from the Outbreak, set 2 chronicles events of key characters at various points throughout Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven. These ten stories are noninteractive but focus on characters in the game and provide their backstories and events as they struggle to survive.

name: Zombie Roguelite
description: Post-apocalyptic top-down shooter roguelite where you play as different characters, equip a variety of weapons, load up on unique loadouts and go zombie shooting. You trade your earned experience for fun upgrades. You can purchase some permanent upgrades that help you get better for the next run!

name: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop
description: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop! For ios

name: Abort
description: Dark shadows linger on the past. The brutal truth is hidden beneath the mask of a seemingly happy family. Dear brother, watch your steps and hold onto my hands. Don't fall into the darkness alone. Be our eyes, be our escape.

name: Void War
description: Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.

name: Fading Echoes
description: A group of guards are charged with defending the royal wedding. Unfortunately for them, this event attracts threats. An incredible adventure awaits them, where they will discover the secrets that lie in their lands, in their legends, and in the dark force that threatens to destroy them.

name: CoreVR
description: Welcome to CoreVR, ready to experience something new, something fresh, something to play with friends and make new ones, make content for you, your friends and everyone in CoreVR. Feel free to make content with our unity Core Creation System.

name: Cogs and Carnage
description: Arm your mech and join your friends on the battlefield, as you send bullets and adversaries flying through the air, in this action packed, fast paced topdown arena shooter. Cogs and Carnage is all about wreaking havoc while having a laugh. Enter the hangar, build your mech and join the fight!

name: Ofuxë the Guardian of Nature
description: Control Ofuxë's kinetic abilities to free the wild animals from the scientists. Complete missions and progress through various maps and levels.

name: Aviassembly
description: Aviassembly gives you the opportunity to build and fly your own airplane. Transport different types of cargo to make money, improve your designs and discover new destinations.

name: Psychomachia
description: Dive into the psychological horror of Psychomachia, trapped in a terrifying loop at the heart of the madness-infested dormitories. Explore the twisted depths of the human mind, confronted by terrifying manifestations of insanity.

name: Just another generic: FPS
description: Craft the perfect soldier and take the fight to the terrorists. Utilize an extensive customization system, from the intricacies of your operator's clothing to the minute details of your firearms, customize it all to your liking.

name: Lair Of The Leviathan
description: Journey through a large open world with a party of heroes exploring dungeons, villages and mysteries. Manage an adventuring party of heroes and choose the way their stories evolve as they journey through a non linear epic adventure towards the ultimate Lair of the Leviathan.

name: Fool's Frontier
description: Build the last refuge in a dying world. Manage the material and psychological needs of your people. Pass laws to prevent discord. Send frail champions on doomed expeditions. Can you find salvation amidst the myriad horrors of the Fool's Frontier?

name: Marble Meadows
description: Marble Meadows is a new cozy 3D platformer full of whimsy & wonder. Relax and roll your way around various thematic stages, or try your hand zipping and bouncing through more complex levels in order to complete skill-based challenges!

name: Hunt and Fight
description: Hunt and Fight is an immersive action RPG. Explore the island, fight monsters, use various combat combinations to defeat bosses, earn reputation and find a way to get home.

name: FreeInfantry
description: Isometric. Massively Multiplayer. Capture The Flag. Skirmish. Bug Hunt. And more. Welcome to FreeInfantry - the world's first massive multiplayer online isometric shooter.

name: Shade Hunters
description: Reclaim a silenced research laboratory from a mysterious threat. With randomized skills for each run, hard-hitting combat, an original soundtrack, unlockable characters, variable difficulty levels, and plenty of secrets to be uncovered, this roguelite RPG offers laughs and challenges for all comers.

name: Embers
description: Take a breath. Feel the warmth as you sip your favorite tea. Are you ready? Now, step away from the bustle of your daily life and into the shadows of the deepest forest. Write, reflect, and stare into the embers.

name: Bullet Speed
description: Bullet speed is a lightning fast paced arena shooter seeing blood fueled robotic avatars cracked on adrenaline shooting each other. Move fast. Kill with style. Repeat.

name: Sealed Bite: Extended
description: Emilia's life turns into chaos as her family members disappear, one by one. Forced to put her trust in a wolf spirit, Emilia sets off to search the land while pressured into feeding a monstrous power. Will the enigmatic figure she encounters offer guidance, or is Emilia diving head-first into peril?

name: European Card Wars
description: Classic strategy drama of the century, you take control of a nation. Rule your country and gain freedom, become the ruler of the world with depth and historical consistency. Rewrite the history of the world and build a magnificent empire.

name: Please Stop Crying
description: Please Stop Crying is a lighthearted horror game about a father taking on housework and babysitting all at once.

name: Spirulena Interceptor
description: In this casual strategy game, navigate the cosmos using classic space control panels. Align orbits and manage energy in a unique sci-fi setting where every switch and button charts your path

name: Old Market Simulator
description: Old Market Simulator is a coop bazaar adventure for 1-2 players. Dive into commerce, manage your reputation, and build your dream market together.

name: Prima: First Rogues
description: Explore the dreamlike world of Prima in an innovative roguelike deckbuilders inspired mechanics. Immerse yourself in a magical universe, subject to the rule of chimeras. Use the strengths of your faction to gain an edge and take part in the schemes that affect Prima.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs is an puzzel game with cool dinosaurs in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: FungEye
description: An evil mushroom is spreading its poison throughout the ecosystem. You must discover the secrets to stop it by solving puzzles, interacting with the environment, and getting help from your fungal friends. Turn on, tune in and drop out, because this is gonna be one long, strange trip!

name: Riptide
description: In Riptide, gear up your ship, customize your loadout, and fight for the fleet! Riptide is a spaceship combat game with an emphasis on powerful customizations and utility. Accomplish your mission by loading up and taking out the enemy.

name: Siphonogore
description: Siphonogore is a Hemothematic Turn-Based Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. The world is meat; calloused and rotten. Within the hollow husk of a sleeping god a war rages for the source of its power. Control a cobbled together creature of obscure origin, a self-made successor, here to take what is yours.

name: Puzzle Maker
description: “Puzzle Maker” is a puzzle game in which you can easily create your own puzzles, as well as play ready-made ones. To complicate or simplify the game, there are customization settings - the number, shapes and boundaries of puzzle pieces.

name: Battle Bean
description: Battle Bean is a fast-paced 3D action platformer game where you run, jump, swing, and spin your way through levels while taking down the Robo-Clan. Collect Items, defeat enemies, save villagers, and restore your once peaceful town of Beanville!

name: Escape from Zeta Aurigae
description: Build your ship, escape the swarm, survive for as long as you can. When you are finally defeated, upgrade your technologies to survive longer next time. Escape from Zeta Aurigae is a sci-fi ship builder with rich meta progression.

name: Blukaty
description: Discover the story about a made up war that happened in soviet territory in the early '90s. Explore old abandoned cities and many more locations around the exclusion zone. Scavenge for loot and stay safe from the hostiles, they could be human, or not. You can also compete in multiplayer game-modes.

name: Hidden in my Paradise
description: Hide objects, decorate, and replicate cool snaps in this cozy hidden-object game where you can create little paradises!

name: Exit 13 Gallery Escape
description: Exit 13 Gallery Escape is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in a gallery on the 13th floor of a building. Your only hope is to find the exit and reach the 1st floor, but every time you do, you end up in the same gallery again and again.

name: The Zombland: Enter at Your Peril
description: In this chilling game of survival you're on a mission to find your friend Marcus in the scary world of zombies. Marcus went into Zombland but never returned. Will you be able to save the kidnapped or become another victim in the zombie horde's grip? Remember they can do anything to stop you ….

name: Strange Parallel: Sele
description: Nothing can stop those destined to meet.Cherish the opportunity given by God and fall in love with every "her" in parallel time and space.This candy contains love, keep it sweet~~~~~

name: Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery
description: Eleanor Grey moves to Silverwood Bay to seek inspiration for her writing.

name: I Am Kilt
description: I Am Kilt is a twin-stick shooter roguelite where you fend off endless hordes of enemies. Combine upgrades to overwhelm the opposition and dominate the field. Do you have the forethought and skill to survive?

name: Hadarot
description: Defend against Gods and mythological creatures with your cards in this unique cards game. Modify your deck as your adventure goes on to kill the God that gave you life and your cards.

name: Sinner
description: Leave a trail of ashes in this 2D Platformer Roguelike. Set yourself ablaze to go through stages and complete their given objective. But don't get too complacent, you can't stay lit forever. Manage your health carefully, the sinful creatures of the Crucible will not stand idle.

name: Lunarball
description: Competitive 3v3, team-based sport set in space! Kick, dribble and punch your way to victory!

name: Corridor Maze: Home Cleanup
description: Sin descripción

name: Bodyguard Task Force
description: Your mission is clear: go solo or team up with 3 other friends to ensure the safety of high-profile VIPs through a series of dynamic and challenging scenarios.

name: All the Mods 9: No Frills
description: ATM9 has over 400 mods and countless quests and a built in proper endgame. No Frills has way less mods but the same endgame.

name: Mountain Legends 3
description: Race to the finish line before it’s too late. Defeat your opponents & be the first to cross the finish line. This Game Works with Gamepad, Keyboard & Touch Screen Devices as well.

name: Mall Manager
description: Welcome to Mall Manager, where you can build and manage your personalized mall. Choose your manager, design from scratch, and expand across unique worlds. A friendly indie management sim.

name: Podnabu
description: Podnabu is a fantasy world where villages, forests, fields, and meadows sprawl. A place shrouded in the mystery of and wondrous laws of nature. Many wanderers have become entangled in the secrets of this world. But perhaps it is you who can unravel the true essence of this world.

name: Phantom Whispers
description: In Phantom Whispers, players embark on a journey into darkness, where reality blends with nightmares, and the line between sanity and madness fades away. Each episode delves deeper into the psyche of the protagonist as they confront their deepest fears and darkest secrets.

name: Tech Disorder
description: "Tech Disorder" merges turn-based strategy, Roguelike elements & deckbuilding in a cyberpunk world. Outwit foes with tactical plays and card combos.

name: Plot!
description: Plot! - It's got Balls... Bounce around the levels to find The Key, The Lock and finally The Door which leads, inexorably, to more of the same. Avoid the Traps and shoot The Meanies for a chance of collectables, but be quick - you only have 90 seconds!

name: CBO TD
description: CBO TD is a build your own maze tower defense. Protect your castle from hordes of mobs with different classes of towers.

name: Arsene Bomber: Cosmic
description: With the Bomberman-inpired game dive headfirst into the chaos. Battle up to 4 players, and conquer 6 thrilling modes. The choice is yours! Play solo for a personal challenge or invite friends to join the chaos. – join the hunt now!

name: Devil Blade Reboot
description: An immersive pseudo-3D experience that pushes the limits of pixel art. Destroying enemies in close vicinity dramatically increases both the difficulty and your score. With the Berserk System, dangerous play is the best choice, as high risk brings high reward.

name: Destroy Them!
description: In Destroy Them, you need to destroy all the robots on 4 differents maps using advanced movements to earn points and beat your high score !

name: Banshee Hunt
description: Banshee Hunt is a hunting horror game featuring the Banshee, a supernatural spirit from Irish folklore, on an island isolated from the world. Track the creature by listening to its distant cries and loud screams, prepare your weapon and kill it, before it reaches you.

name: Band of Brigands
description: Band of Brigands is an exhilarating dungeon crawler where players vie for riches in treacherous depths. Outsmart lurking monsters and rival brigands alike. Snatch valuable loot and escape before your teammates do. In this world, trust is transient, and alliances shift like shadows.

name: Glitter
description: It is a casual puzzle game with great features and advantages.

name: Letter Lancers
description: A 4-player couch co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell that will have you and your friends laughing your way through epic battles! Grab your friends, pick your characters, and get ready to ruin someone's day! Level up, select from hundreds of modifiers, get loot, and earn your place on the leaderboards!

name: Sunday Run
description: Sunday Run is a single-player speedrunning platformer with a chill vibe and global leaderboards.
